original_text: And when he had destroyed seven nations in the land of Chanaan, he divided their land to them by lot.
korean_text: 가나안 땅 일곱 족속을 멸하사 그 땅을 기업으로 주시기까지 약 사백오십 년간이라

sentences.original_text: And when he had destroyed seven nations
he divided their land to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들의 땅을 그들에게 나누어 주었고
